p:
The genotype of the HPeV of each sample was identified by querying the consensus sequence generated from the Ampliseq panel against the Nucleotide database of NCBI using the Basic Local Alignment Search Tool (BLAST) ( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/BLAST/). When insufficient consensus sequence was available to identify the genotype of the HPeV, a human parechovirus VP1 typing PCR
22 was performed and the amplicon sequenced to identify the genotype.
